section.p: This section describes the parameters required to create a user. Log into the SM GUI, navigate to Subscriber Manager> Users tab.
To add a user, click , add the basic details, associations, and custom data to the user as described in the given table:

entry.p: This parameter indicates the unique ID associated with a user. When no user ID is assigned, the NCC system assigns a unique UUID.
Note: To create a user, you must provide the user ID, device ID, or Manage Element Name for selecting Manage Element.
The first email address/contact number will receive the email or SMS notification.

row.entry: This parameter indicates the first name of the user.
This parameter indicates the last name of the user.
This parameter indicates the Facebook ID associated with the user.
This parameter indicates the e-mail address of the user for notification purposes.
This parameter indicates the security domain associated with the user.
Select the pre-configured security domain from the drop-down list.

entry.p: This parameter indicates the phone number of the user identified by the user ID for notification purposes.
Click ADD MORE PHONE NUMBERS to support the configuration of multiple phone numbers.

row.entry: This parameter indicates the notification profile ID for the user.
Select the required notification profile from the drop-down list.
This parameter indicates the name of the user lifecycle you want to add for the user.
This parameter indicates the state of the user.

Denotes the time used for entity lifecycle of user and refers to the validity time of a given state of that lifecycle. It is set when timer is configured in a lifecycle state transition. It is a read only parameter and is not set/updated in the Create/Update requests of lifecycle entities. It is only set internally by the lifecycle state transitions.
Set when timer is configured in lifecycle state transition
This parameter indicates the name of the device associated with the user. You can add more than one device by clicking the + button.
This parameter indicates the name of the Managed Element to which this user can be distributed.
Select the required Managed Element from the drop-down list.

entry.p: Add custom data: This enables to add custom data dictionary to a user.
The following parameters are listed when you click the ADD CUSTOM DATA button:

row.entry: This parameter indicates the name of a custom data pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.
Select the required key from the drop-down list.
Mandatory if custom data is added.
This parameter indicates the type that is not configurable and pre-configured in the custom data dictionary.

entry.p: Select the type from the drop-down list that can be either of the following:

row.entry: Mandatory if custom data is added.

entry.p: This parameter indicates the value for the type configured.
Note: For every value that you add, press the Enter key and click Save.

row.entry: This is a pre-selected drop-down. It indicates a value as per the value of the key parameter selected.
Mandatory if custom data is added.
